/**
 * Convert Celsius to Fahrenheit
 */export const celsiusToFahrenheit=celsius=>{return celsius*9/5+32;};/**
 * Format temperature based on unit preference
 */export const formatTemperature=(tempC,isCelsius)=>{const temp=isCelsius?tempC:celsiusToFahrenheit(tempC);return"".concat(Math.round(temp),"\xB0").concat(isCelsius?'C':'F');};/**
 * Get day name from date string
 */export const getDayName=dateString=>{const date=new Date(dateString);return date.toLocaleDateString('en-US',{weekday:'long'});};/**
 * Format date for display
 */export const formatDate=dateString=>{const date=new Date(dateString);return date.toLocaleDateString('en-US',{month:'short',day:'numeric'});};
